articles.description: NEW DELHI: Oppo has slashed prices of variants of Oppo A12, Oppo A15, Oppo F17 and Oppo Reno 3 Pro. The handsets have got a price cut of up to Rs 2,000. As per a tweet shared by Mahesh Telecom, Oppo A12 with 3GB RAM and 32GB storage will retail at Rs 8,990 no…
